Unlimited Options.  Can schedule by GMT.3.	Geocode your video.  Play video by location (Country, State, City, zip etc). Target your audience.4. Create Closed Captioning for video (Both Standard & Advanced).7.	Display custom advanced video control player.8.	Have option to layer custom clickable image anywhere over top of video (Watermark etc).9.	Create Video Clickable Bookmarks.10.	Create Selectable Video Endings.11.	Enter SEO / Meta Data information.12.	Display video analytics with built in stats.13.	Voice recognition coming soon14.	Plus many more advanced options.Sample Interactive Videos:1. I was asked by 4-seasons (Bora-Bora resort) to make their site image interactive: [url removed, login to view]6. Here I created a simple interactive image / map as a test sample - [url removed, login to view]8. I created an interactive video for this window blinds company. Images clickable. Watch all the way - [url removed, login to view]9. I made sample video about Interactivity) - [url removed, login to view]10. This one is for the medical / hospital industry. Generic stuff: [url removed, login to view]11. I met a photographer who specializes in food shoots so I put this one together: [url removed, login to view]These are all html5 based. This is an area I am still working on.My proposal is that I need help to make my website as visible as this one: [url removed, login to view] which I know generates a LOT of customers on its own. But how does it do that, is the question? I need someone who can look into that for me, whether that means better SEO or even a totally different approach.
